snippet: Ben S. Bernanke, the former Federal Reserve chairman, and Timothy F. Geithner, the former Treasury secretary, reminisced and joked at a Manhattan Barnes & Noble.
abstract: Former Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke begins book tour for his memoir The Courage to Act with former Treasury Secretary Timothy F Geithner at Barnes & Noble in Manhattan; event reunites two men who played pivotal roles in financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Ben S. Bernanke, the former Federal Reserve chairman, and Timothy F. Geithner, the former Treasury secretary, reminisced and joked at a Manhattan Barnes & Noble.

headline.main: In a Reunion, Bernanke and Geithner Revisit the Crisis
headline.print_headline: Book Tour Reunites 2 Guardians of Finance

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Courage to Act: A Memoir of a Crisis and Its Aftermath (Book)
